chamara piris ge ‘yaya 4’ swarnawahiniyerupawahini prekshakayanta aluthma athdakimak ragath ‘yaya 4’ telinatyaya me dinawala swarnawahini rupawahini sewaye sama iridawakama rathri 9 ta wikashaya we.wana rakshithayakata mayim wu gammanayaka minisunge jiwithath ehi pawul kipayak wata gethunu kathawak lesa diwena ‘yaya 4’ sammananiya adhyakshawarayek wana chamara janaraj pirisge nirmanayaki.chamaragema kathawa asurin mema telinatyaye thirarachanaya chamara piris, thimira udalamaththa ha thushani bulumullage liya atha.winil manik nishpadanayak wana ‘yaya 4’ telinatyaye sangithaya rawihans watake pothageni.parisaraya gana, wana sampatha gana ehi wesena satha sipawa gana katha karana atharathurema premaya pilibandawa da kathabahata lak kerena ‘yaya 4’ hi morin charuni, bimal jayakodi, himali siriwardhana, saranga disasekara, eranga jiwantha, dinakshi priyasad, chamupa godage, thimira udalamaththa, sangitha basnayaka, pawitha wikramasinha, asela sapuaarachchi, pabasara kariyawasam aadi nalu niliyo rasak ranganayen dayaka wethi.isawikarthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

ech.aar. silwa (rita perera) mathiniya - wishramalath usawi sarayan ji.ke. perera mahathage priyadara bharyawa wuda, sunil : (wishramika shri lanka guwan hamudawa), shanthi (eekala), reksi (ayis man samagama) rekha (gampaha), nimal (widuli karmika) nimalka (gampaha), shyamali (a.e.ja.), jenita (siriwardhana widuhala, yatiyanthota) yana ayage dayabara maniyan wuda, indira (jathika pashu sampath mandalaya), thilak (eekala), anoja (podi wi kumbaura, ragama), nirmalal (gampaha), chandani (mahanuwara) suranji (gampaha), priyashantha (a.e.ja.), demiyan (shri lanka baladaksha sangamaya) yana ayage dayabara nandaniya wuda, yatiyanthota wisu rita perera mahathmiya awurudu 84 k aayu walanda swargastha wuyen ee pilibanda awasan katayuthu 2019 janawari masa 11 wana dina pa.wa. 3.30 ta yatiyanthota shantha mariya dewasthana susana bhumiye di sidu karana bawa itha kanagatuwen danum demu. 160, ginigathhena para, yatiyanthota.
